item.title: Brittany add a quote by Dietrich Bonhoeffer
item.description: "Music... will help dissolve your perplexities and purify your character and sensibilities, and in time of care and sorrow, will keep a fountain of joy alive in you." -- Dietrich Bonhoeffer

item.title: Brittany add a quote by D.L. Moody
item.description: "I firmly believe that the moment our hearts are emptied of selfishness and ambition and self-seeking and everything that is contrary to God's law, the Holy Spirit will come and fill every corner of our hearts; but if we are full of pride and conceit, ambition and self-seeking, pleasure and the world, there is no room for the Spirit of God. I also believe that many a man is praying to God to fill him, when he is full already with something else. Before we pray that God would fill us, I believe we ought to pray that He would empty us. There must be a n emptying before there can be a filling; and when the heart is turned upside down, and everything that is contrary to God is turned out, then the Spirit will come..." -- D.L. Moody

item.title: Brittany add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "I believe in Christianity as I believe that the sun has risen: not only because I see it, but because by it I see everything else." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Brittany add a quote by William Nicholson
item.description: "I pray because I can't help myself. I pray because I'm helpless. I pray because the need flows out of me all the time- waking and sleeping. It doesn't change God- it changes me." -- William Nicholson

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Fiona Apple
item.description: "When the Pawn Hits the Conflicts He Thinks Like a King What He Knows Throws the Blows When He Goes to the Fight and He'll Win the Whole Thing 'Fore He Enters the Ring There's No Body to Batter When Your Mind Is Your Might So When You Go Solo, You Hold Your Own Hand and Remember That Depth Is the Greatest of Heights and If You Know Where You Stand, Then You Know Where to Land and If You Fall It Won't Matter, Cuz You'll Know That You're Right" -- Fiona Apple

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Abigail Adams
item.description: "The habits of a vigorous mind are born in contending with difficulties." -- Abigail Adams

item.title: Brittany add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "There are far, far better things ahead than any we leave behind." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Anne Bishop
item.description: "There are some questions that shouldn't be asked until a person is mature enough to appreciate the answers." -- Anne Bishop

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Devon Ashley
item.description: "I'm not looking for the perfect man. I'm looking for the man whose imperfections I can put up with." -- Devon Ashley

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Dorothy Day
item.description: "I have long since come to believe that people never mean half of what they say, and that it is best to disregard their talk and judge only their actions." -- Dorothy Day

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Dorothy Day
item.description: "My strength returns to me with my cup of coffee and the reading of the psalms. " -- Dorothy Day

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Dorothy Day
item.description: "People say, what is the sense of our small effort? They cannot see that we must lay one brick at a time, take one step at a time. A pebble cast into a pond causes ripples that spread in all directions. Each one of our thoughts, words and deeds is like that. No one has a right to sit down and feel hopeless. There is too much work to do." -- Dorothy Day

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Dorothy Day
item.description: "Don't worry about being effective. Just concentrate on being faithful to the truth." -- Dorothy Day

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Dorothy Day
item.description: "We must talk about poverty, because people insulated by their own comfort lose sight of it." -- Dorothy Day

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Modest Mouse
item.description: "Music is to the soul what words are to the mind." -- Modest Mouse

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Plato
item.description: "Music gives a soul to the universe, wings to the mind, flight to the imagination and life to everything." -- Plato

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Jim Elliot
item.description: "Let not our longing slay the appetite of our living." -- Jim Elliot
